General.Description: Quantstamp (QSP) is considered as one of the 2nd generantion of cryptocurrency. Based on the Ethereum network, the Quantstamp provide the users a protocol as well as a scalable and cost-effective audit system to all smart contracts. Moreover, by using the SAT solver software, the users are easy to verify the programs solidity and leverage a distributed network of participants.
General.Features: QSP gave the participants many advantages such as searching multi-type data in blockchain world. Especially, all the materials that QSP provides is open-source, which means that you can access the global platform without paying any fee. Moreover, the algorithm that built up the Quantstamp's foudation is value ranking of Ethereum.
General.Technology: Built on an ERC-20 token, it means that Quantstamp token will make benefit for users in several ways. Moreover, QSP can reward for anyone contributing for the platform and verifying the solidity programs.
